stories.text: During a trip to Rome, Italy in 2021, I met a man who told me I needed to create an API. After returning to the states, I enrolled in a coding bootcamp with one sole mission: learn to create an API. During bootcamp I created my first few projects including Password Generator and Budget Breaker

After completing the month program, I became an overly confident fake-it-until-you-make-it full stack developer. Using a free API, I created the project 'Love compatibility'. During this time, I mastered HTML and vanilla CSS.
Shortly after, I recognized a new world of development - VR Development. I began to teach myself a new VR HTML language named A-frame and deployed my first enviornment.

I quickly realized the importance of owning domain names after hearing about a political smear campaign story. This inspired me to purchase my first domain: my own name. Since then, I've acquired more than 30 domains. My very first React portfolio was then created, marking the beginning of my epic journey in web development.

Here is the part in my journey where digital art began. I started creating custom domains and digital art portfolios, designing unique images using Adobe Creative Cloud. To bring these creations to life, I began exploring frameworks like Framer Motion and AOS, showcasing digital images in innovative and dynamic ways.

Now I know what you're thinking - at what point do you get good?! One day I woke up and things began to click within React and design. There were a few projects from 2023 that deepened my fundamentals like these.

In 2023 I secured my first developer position at a church in Columbus, Ohio. By April 2024, I received a full ride ticket to the 2024 Las Vegas React Conference hosted by Meta and Callstack. This experience marked a turning point, as I made connections and solidified my expertise in frameworks like React and TypeScript.

This brings us to 2025, modern day. After creating a digital agency at the beginning of the year, I decided to rededicate my time to myself and my portfolio. I will continue to push out more projects, more github commits, and am currently learning Python. I will include a python project soon.

Thanks so much for viewing! Check out more information in my menu including links to some of my personal writings and images. I anticipate more projects like 'ProjectB' and 'Masks', as well as python projects in the future.
